mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum no, t.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM blacklist b INNER JOIN review r ON(b.blacklist_post_no = r.review_no) INNER JOIN membership m ON(b.user_no = m.user_no) WHERE b.blacklist_board = '후기' AND r.review_state = 0 AND r.review_content LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY blacklist_no DESC ) t ORDER BY no ) x WHERE no between #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM blacklist b INNER JOIN review r ON(b.blacklist_post_no = r.review_no) INNER JOIN membership m ON(b.user_no = m.user_no) WHERE b.blacklist_board = '후기' AND r.review_state = 0 AND r.review_content LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%')
SELECT blacklist_post_no FROM blacklist WHERE blacklist_no = #{blacklistNo}
